function.name: get_user_prescriptions
function.description: List prescriptions for the logged-in user. Use when the user asks about their prescriptions.

user_id.description: User id for the logged-in user. If omitted, it will be inferred from the session.

active_only.description: When true, return only active prescriptions (pending/ready).

lang.description: Language code for messages (en, he, ru, ar).
